document_data.name: Karsus Castle
document_data.mainbody: '''Karsus Castle''' was the palatial home of [[Karsus]], the archmage of [[Eileanar]] [[enclave]].
document_data.Location: The Castle was on a small mount near the middle of the city, overlooking the [[League of Noted Singers and Performers]] and [[Constabulary Branch One]].
document_data.Structure: The palace was as elaborate and fantastical as any other structure in Karsus, with features such as an internal ''[[portal]]'' network, locally altered [[gravity plane]]s , and miraculously self-supporting delicate architecture.
